effects.display_string:
Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Wildfire Bomb by 3% stacking up to 6 times. 
Wildfire Bomb has a 15% chance to end your Winning Streak!
Set: When your Winning Streak! ends, your next Raptor Strike deals 400% increased damage and reduces the cooldown of Wildfire Bomb by 10 sec.
(2) Set: Wildfire Bomb damage increased by 8%.
(4) Set: Raptor Strike deals 20% increased damage to targets affected by Wildfire Bomb.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call an earthen ally to your aid, supporting you in combat.

Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 6,890 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 181 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

name: Loamm Niffen Tabard
description: Give the Niffen a reason to call you smelly.
